defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence generated in the process of building the Current Documents collection at the Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, French, German, Dutch

scopecontent.p: The correspondence is from various management and labor organizations in response to inquries for copies of collective bargaining agreements, personnel policies, and other documents.

controlaccess.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives.
Martin P. Catherwood Library. Labor-Management Documentation Center.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Kheel Center Current Documents Correspondence #/4212. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /4133: J. Gormly Miller Papers /4169: Martin P. Catherwood Library Librarian's Office Additional Files 6103: Labor Relations Board Files
